blocks.name: imaiinfv
blocks.content: Indexed intersection of an image. (Contributed by Stefan O'Rear, 22-Feb-2015.)
blocks.origin:
thm imaiinfv(setvar s0, class c0, class c1, class c2) {
  |- wi(wa(wfn(c0, c1), wss(c2, c1)), wceq(ciin(s0, c2, cfv(c0, cv(s0))), cint(cima(c0, c2))))
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s0, c2)
} = {
  3eqtr4g(ciin(s0, c2, cfv(c0, cv(s0))), cint(cima(c0, c2)), ciin(s0, c2, cfv(cres(c0, c2), cv(s0))), cint(crn(cres(c0, c2))), wa(wfn(c0, c1), wss(c2, c1)))
  syl(wa(wfn(c0, c1), wss(c2, c1)), wceq(ciin(s0, c2, cfv(cres(c0, c2), cv(s0))), cint(crn(cres(c0, c2)))), wfn(cres(c0, c2), c2))
  fnssres(c0, c1, c2)
  fniinfv(s0, cres(c0, c2), c2)
  eqcomi(ciin(s0, c2, cfv(c0, cv(s0))), ciin(s0, c2, cfv(cres(c0, c2), cv(s0))))
  iineq2i(s0, c2, cfv(cres(c0, c2), cv(s0)), cfv(c0, cv(s0)))
  fvres(cv(s0), c2, c0)
  inteqi(cima(c0, c2), crn(cres(c0, c2)))
  df-ima(c0, c2)
  diff.cres.s(s0, c0, c2)
}
blocks.pretty:
thm imaiinfv(setvar s0, class c0, class c1, class c2) {
  ⊢ ((c0[Fn]c1 ∧ c2 ⊆ c1)→ ⋂(s0 ∈ c2,(c0 ` s0))= ⋂(c0 " c2))
  ⊣ d(s0, c0)
  ⊣ d(s0, c2)
} = {
  3eqtr4g(⋂(s0 ∈ c2,(c0 ` s0)), ⋂(c0 " c2), ⋂(s0 ∈ c2,((c0 |` c2)` s0)), ⋂ ran((c0 |` c2)), (c0[Fn]c1 ∧ c2 ⊆ c1))
  syl((c0[Fn]c1 ∧ c2 ⊆ c1), ⋂(s0 ∈ c2,((c0 |` c2)` s0))= ⋂ ran((c0 |` c2)), (c0 |` c2)[Fn]c2)
  fnssres(c0, c1, c2)
  fniinfv(s0, (c0 |` c2), c2)
  eqcomi(⋂(s0 ∈ c2,(c0 ` s0)), ⋂(s0 ∈ c2,((c0 |` c2)` s0)))
  iineq2i(s0, c2, ((c0 |` c2)` s0), (c0 ` s0))
  fvres(s0, c2, c0)
  inteqi((c0 " c2), ran((c0 |` c2)))
  df-ima(c0, c2)
  diff.cres.s(s0, c0, c2)
}
